channel.title: THE SOPHIE BLOG
channel.description: The one and only RSS feed for Sophie Computer.

item.title: 0000 [2023-04-02]: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my first blog post! The website is UP and RUNNING!

item.title: 0001 [2023-04-15]: Polyhedral Compilation and The Owl House
item.description: Describes my invitation to a conference, a description of the super interesting "Polyhedral" approach to optimizing some types of programs, and a big review of The Owl House finale.

item.title: 0002 [2023-08-03]: Gender and the Bookzone
item.description: Summarizes what I've been up to since the last post, including some projects I worked on, a gender update, and a bunch of books I've read.

item.title: 0003 [2023-08-16]: Staying Anonymous
item.description: Talks about an apartment move I made, along with my thoughts on the difficulty of staying anonymous on the internet and how image fingerprinting makes everything harder.

item.title: 0004 [2023-12-27]: Euclid's Theorem
item.description: Describes Euclid's Theorem, a short theorem which proves why there are an infinite amount of prime numbers.

item.title: 0005 [2024-1-1]: 2023's Sophie in Review
item.description: Summarizes the events of Sophie over the past twelve months.

item.title: 0006 [2024-1-8]: What Am I Supposed to DO
item.description: I write through a little emotional thought-process i was spiraling through, and a nice resolution i came to later on.

item.title: 0007 [2024-1-9]: I LOVE CONSUMING THINGS
item.description: I decided to stop using social media on the weekdays, and only use social media through a reduced format, in order to stop myself from using it way too much like i have been already.

item.title: 0008 [2024-1-28]: The Sophie Gene
item.description: A little pep talk for sophie, and some stuff about books i've read (demon copperhead; atomic habits).

item.title: 0009 [2024-2-18]: My Sophie Experience with Sophiness
item.description: Free will isn't real and everything is deterministic and that sucks. I talk about balls on hills. I also mention reading My Lesbian Experience with Loneliness.

item.title: 0010 [2024-3-2]: My Many Meows
item.description: I complain about identity and work. Nothin much but that!

item.title: 0011 [2024-5-10]: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
item.description: I forgot I wrote this and only noticed two months later. I'm posting it any ways since I never delete anything I spend time on.

item.title: 0012 [2024-5-14]: I Think Diana Cavendish Should Kill Atsuko Kagari
item.description: I summarize the end of the semester and I talk about how I've Got to get more Serious.

item.title: 0013 [2024-8-29]: On The Nature of Desire; also stuff about girls' last tour
item.description: i talk about girls' last tour and how i probably shouldnt have read it in my current mental state.
